title: TDP MPs protest demanding special status to AP
title_page: Errabus - TDP MPs protest demanding special status to AP
text:
TDP MPs protest demanding special status to AP
July 23 2015 at 12:35 441 Special Status Ap Delhi Venkaiah Naidu Sujana Chowdary
The Telugu Desam Party MPs on Thursday staged a protest at the Parliament premises demanding special status for Andhra Pradesh. Holding placards, the TDP MPs who staged a sit-in in front of the Gandhi statue, shouted slogans in favour of special status.
The MPs include JC Diwakar Reddy, Nimmala Krishnappa, Thota Narasimham, Ramohan Naidu and others who asked the Central government to implement all promises made in the Bifurcation Bill. On Wednesday, the TRS MPs held a dharna at the Parliament premises, they shouted slogans seeking a separate High Court for Telangana.
Meanwhile, the Lok Sabha was adjourned till noon after the Opposition raised a ruckus over the Vyapam recruitment scam and the controversy over BJP leaders' association with former IPL chief Lalit Modi.
